apple_vendor_description: This rendition of the palms up together emoji on Apple devices showcases two hands with a rich, deep skin tone, presented with Apple's signature realistic lighting and soft, rounded edges.  The smooth, glossy finish of the skin suggests openness and generosity, with subtle highlights reflecting light beautifully.  Itâ€™s commonly used on Apple devices to signify asking for something, offering help, or expressing a hopeful plea with genuine warmth.
